maser.utils.cdf.converter.xlsx2skt module¶

xlsx2skt module.

Module to convert an Excel (.xlsx) file into a CDF skeleton table (.skt).

class maser.utils.cdf.converter.xlsx2skt.Xlsx2skt(xlsx_file, skt_file=None, output_dir=None, overwrite=False, ignore_none=False, auto_pad=False, verbose=True, debug=False, quiet=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to convert a formatted Excel file into a CDF skeleton table.
